section.name: User's Guide
section.p: Here we have assembled a bunch of guides and howto like documents that demonstrate how the server can be used. Hopefully this will grow into a user's guide.

tr.td: Shows how to build the directory server from the repository.
Demonstrates how to bind to the server as admin and setup other user accounts.
Describes the JNDI properties used to control the behavoir and configuration of the server.
A howto on creating context partitions besides the system partition and having them store entries for a specific naming context.
Lists the goals, properties and the steps required to integrate your project with the Maven Plugin for the directory server.
